class VILoss[source]

VILoss(model, base_loss=MSELoss(), kl_weight=0.1) :: Module

Calculate the Kullback-Leibler divergence loss.

Parameters

model : dies.embedding the given embedding to base the loss on lambd : float scalar for the loss
